title: Not getting Mecha Rengar from loot?
body: I've owned every skin in the game now for over a year so whenever a new skin comes out I just re-roll 3 of my shards and get the new content, but I tried a few hours it was released and got a skin permanent for a skin I already owned and a Riot live support person nice enough to be able to revert it, but i just tried again (impatient I know..) and it happened again hours later. this issue has never happened to me before. Is the loot system currently bugged? I wanted to play as my robot kitty :( thanks in advance if anyone can help! {{sticker:cass-cry}}

replies.body: So I pulled up your account and saw all the back and forth reversions happening. Since it didn't work the first time, it was most likely due to the skin not having been added to the list yet. I saw you still had a ticket open, so let them know this happened again in your ticket to see if they can get it reversed again.

I'm in the same boat!

opening a ticket
